title: Yosemite National Park
name: Hodgdon Meadow
description: This campground is located north of Crane Flat near the park entrance and is open year-round.  Reservations are required from April through September, and offers 105 sites for both tents and RVs up to 35' in length. Four group sites are available for 15-25 people. Water and flush toilets are available.
